# Manage API keys in Anrok

Learn how to manage integration-specific API keys in Anrok for the Zuora-Anrok integration.

The Zuora-Anrok integration requires an integration-specific API key.

1.  Sign in to the Anrok portal.
2.  Navigate to under Transaction Sources as shown in the following snapshot:

    ![Anrok Data Sources](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/b8f03b19-2aba-436d-af18-41352c277f8f?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..ynsUgX_LHttMDp52Jn3O0zw4c9lbDn-6IeFUINtIEHA)

3.  Generate and save the API key for use in Zuora Billing.
